statements: SELECT * FROM solo_travel_reviews;
SELECT review_id, destination_name, rating FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_text, destination_name, rating FROM solo_travel_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_id, destination_name, rating FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE destination_name = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, review_text, rating FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE review_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM solo_travel_reviews GROUP BY destination_name;
SELECT destination_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE rating > 3 GROUP BY destination_name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT user_id, destination_name, review_text FROM solo_travel_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%amazing%' AND rating = 5 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT destination_name, review_text FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews ORDER BY destination_name ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT destination_name, rating FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews WHERE destination_name = 'Paris'
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT destination_name, rating, review_text FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews WHERE destination_name LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT u.username, d.destination_name, d.rating FROM users u INNER JOIN solo_travel_destinations_reviews d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT destination_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_reviews FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews GROUP BY destination_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY number_of_reviews DESC;
SELECT user_id, avg(rating) AS average_rating FROM solo_travel_destinations_reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3.5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, destination_description FROM solo_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, destination_description FROM solo_travel_destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT destination_name, destination_description FROM solo_travel_destinations WHERE destination_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT destination_name, destination_description FROM solo_travel_destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT destination_name, destination_description, review_text, rating FROM solo_travel_destinations INNER JOIN user_reviews ON solo_travel_destinations.destination_id = user_reviews.destination_id;
SELECT destination_name, destination_description FROM solo_travel_destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, description FROM destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM destinations JOIN reviews ON destinations.destination_id = reviews.destination_id GROUP BY destinations.destination_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, description FROM destinations WHERE destination_name LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY destination_name ASC;

SELECT users.username, reviews.rating, destinations.destination_name FROM users JOIN reviews ON users.user_id = reviews.user_id JOIN destinations ON reviews.destination_id = destinations.destination_id WHERE reviews.rating > 4 ORDER BY users.username DESC;

SELECT destination_name, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM destinations JOIN reviews ON destinations.destination_id = reviews.destination_id GROUP BY destination_name HAVING total_reviews > 5 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT users.username, tags.tag_name FROM users LEFT JOIN tags ON users.user_id = tags.tag_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, country, rating FROM destinations;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT destination_id, review_date, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY destination_name ASC
SELECT destination_name, country, rating FROM destinations WHERE country = 'Italy' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT user_id, destination_id, review_date, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE last_activity_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY registration_date ASC

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_destinations FROM categories JOIN destinations ON categories.category_id = destinations.id GROUP BY category_name HAVING num_destinations > 2 ORDER BY num_destinations DESC
